title: 40-year-old stabbed to death in Horana
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 40-year-old resident of Welwatta, Hikkaduwa was stabbed to death in the Horana area.
Investigations revealed that the murder had taken place as a result of an argument that had broken out while consuming alcohol.
The 31-year-old suspect involved in the murder has been arrested and he is a resident of Hallahitigala, Galle.
